content: from hook 6 single_crochet slip_stitch to join this round only round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 single_crochet round 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around 18 single_crochet round 4 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around 24 single_crochet round 5 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around 30 single_crochet round 6 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around 36 single_crochet slip_stitch to join this round only round 7 single_crochet in back loop only of each single_crochet 36 single_crochet round 8 - 12 single_crochet in each single_crochet 36 single_crochet round 13 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet decrease around 1 single_crochet 29 single_crochet round 14 single_crochet in each single_crochet 29 single_crochet round 15 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet decrease around 1 single_crochet 22 single_crochet round 16 single_crochet in each single_crochet 22 single_crochet slip_stitch to join this round leave 24 tail to sew body to head fasten_off © 2008 hooked on fauna all rights reserved - 2 - sniffles the bunny arm make 2 with contrasting color cc chain 2 round 1 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 6 single_crochet slip_stitch to join this round round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet 12 single_crochet slip_stitch to join this round fasten_off with mc round 1 - 4 single_crochet in each single_crochet 12 single_crochet round 5 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet decrease around 9 single_crochet round 6 single_crochet in next single_crochet decrease around 6 single_crochet slip_stitch to join this round leave 12 tail to sew arm to body fasten_off ear make 2 with cc chain 3 turn round 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and next 1 chain 2 single_crochet chain 1 turn round 2 7 single_crochet in each single_crochet 2 single_crochet chain 1 turn fasten_off you will now have a rectangular-shaped piece piece a fig 1 with mc round 1 7 single_crochet evenly up right side of piece a half_double_crochet & double_crochet & half_double_crochet in one st at top of piece a fig 2 7 single_crochet evenly down left side of piece a 17 sts slip_stitch in cc chain row fig 3 & 4 this helps shape the ear round 2 skipping slip_stitch you just made slip_stitch in 1st 3 single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet half_double_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next single_crochet half_double_crochet & double_crochet & half_double_crochet in next single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next single_crochet half_double_crochet in next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet sl in next 3 single_crochet slip_stitch in cc chain row leave 12 tail to sew ear to head fasten_off cheek make 2 with mc chain 3 making sure the 1st chain is fairly loose 12 double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook alternatively you can use a magic_ring instead of the chain 3 and crochet 12 double_crochet in the magic_ring slip_stitch to join round leave a 12 tail to sew cheek to head fasten_off tail with mc chain 6 making the 1st chain very loose
